txt.en: Talk to Auti at the Orc-watch

The mirror in the Redhorn Lodes, used to reflect the light and illuminate the mine, has been knocked out of alignment, likely by the Orcs who roam there. The dwarves will have difficulty exploring safely if they cannot see.
'Thank you, [placeholder], for fixing the mirror. Now I can see, at least until those blasted Orcs knock it out of alignment again.'
'If those White Hand Orcs bump that mirror one more time, I'm apt to go out there myself.'
The mirror in the Redhorn Lodes is constantly being knocked out of alignment by the White Hand Orcs dominating the mine.
Talk to Auti near the grodbog hive
Auti is camped just north of the grodbog hive, west of the mirror, in the southern cavern of Redhorn Lodes.\n\nAuti will be pleased to hear that the mirror in the Redhorn Lodes has been re-aligned.
Talk to Auti at the Orc-watch
Auti is at the Orc-watch, north-west of the Claw Hollow.\n\nAuti will be pleased to hear that the mirror in the Redhorn Lodes has been re-aligned.
